rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with reception area adhering to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Expansive living room integrated with a modern industrial design aesthetic, featuring exposed brick walls and open-plan layout.
Dining area designed to encourage family gatherings with natural lighting enhancing the ambiance.
Fully equipped kitchen with an industrial design twist; includes modern appliances and ample storage, positioned in accordance with Vastu recommendations.
Utility room for household chores, ensuring a clutter-free environment and efficient workflow.
Guest bathroom designed with dual fixtures to cater to both male and female guests, following local building norms.
Dedicated home office space tailored for work-from-home setups; designed with industrial elements and ergonomic layout.

openings.description: Main entry door facing the positive Vastu direction with security features.
Secondary exit aligning with industrial aesthetics and natural lighting.
Large window allowing ample daylight into the living room while offering privacy and energy efficiency.

rooms.description: Luxury master bedroom with private ensuite bathroom; designed for rest and relaxation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom tailored for family members, ensuring privacy and ample storage space.
Additional bedroom designed for joint family use; features industrial design elements integrated with luxury finishes.
Full bathroom servicing the upper floor bedrooms, ensuring compliance with local building codes and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balcony door providing access to a small private outdoor space for relaxation.
Window overlooking the staircase ensuring safety and natural lighting in transitional spaces.
